```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import data
```{r}
acc_df = read.csv("./data/accel_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
combine all activity columns
```{r}
acc_df = acc_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    activity_1:activity_1440,
    names_to = "activity",
    values_to = "counts/minute"
  )
```
